title: Calories in a Roma Tomato
meta_description: Discover calories in roma tomato, including macros like protein, carbs, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per medium fruit.
assumptions: Medium Roma tomato (~62 g), raw, fresh, with skin; no added seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One medium Roma tomato has about 11 kcal and 0.6 g protein.

label_note: Values align with Nutrition Facts labels for straightforward comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Roma tomato?
faqs.a: Approximately 11 kcal for a medium raw Roma tomato.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Roma tomato?
faqs.a: About 2.4 g total carbs, including 0.7 g fiber and 1.6 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a Roma tomato low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.1 g fat per medium tomato, with 0 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How does Roma tomato nutrition compare to regular tomato?
faqs.a: Similar per gram; Roma is denser and meatier, but calories are comparable at ~18 kcal per 100 g.

faqs.q: Does cooking change calories in Roma tomato?
faqs.a: Minimal change if no oil added; roasting might concentrate nutrients slightly but adds few calories.
